mapper.select: SELECT i.GI_CODE AS giCode, i.GI_NAME AS giName, i.GCM_CODE AS gcmCode, c.GCM_NAME AS gcmName FROM GE_ITEMS i LEFT JOIN GE_COM_MEMBER c ON i.GCM_CODE = c.GCM_CODE ORDER BY i.GI_CODE DESC

SELECT i.GI_CODE AS giCode, i.GI_NAME AS giName, i.GCM_CODE AS gcmCode, c.GCM_NAME AS gcmName FROM GE_ITEMS i LEFT JOIN GE_COM_MEMBER c ON i.GCM_CODE = c.GCM_CODE WHERE i.GI_CODE = #{giCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GE_ITEMS (GI_CODE, GI_NAME, GCM_CODE, GI_DEL_FLAG) VALUES (#{giCode}, #{giName}, #{gcmCode}, 'N')

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GE_ITEMS WHERE GI_CODE = #{giCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
